匘字的基本解释

匘
nǎo
古同“脑”。

匘字的汉语字典释义

[①]［nǎo］
［《廣韻》奴晧切，上晧，泥。］
“脑1”的繁体字。
(1)高等动物主管全身运动和感觉的器官，是神经系统的主要部分。人脑还主管思维、记忆等活动。
(2)称能模拟或代替人脑进行某种活动的事物。
(3)头颅。
(4)谓击破头颅，脑浆溢出。引申指打击。
(5)物体的顶端、中心或边缘部分。
(6)指白色如脑状或脑髓之物。

匘字的康熙字典解释

【子集下】【匕字部】　匘； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页153第04
【唐韻】奴皓切【集韻】乃老切，?音惱。【說文】匘，頭髓也。从匕。匕，相匕著也。巛象髮，囟象匘形。【廣韻】同腦。【玉篇】亦作?。【集韻】或作??，?詳腦字註。

匘
Basic explanation of words
匘
nǎo
Gu Tong "brain".
匘
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［nǎo］
["Guangyun" Slave cutting, upper sea, mud. ]
Traditional characters for "脑1".
(1) Higher animals are in charge of body movement and sensory organs, and are the main part of the nervous system. The human brain is also in charge of thinking, memory and other activities.
(2) It refers to things that can simulate or replace the human brain to perform certain activities.
(3) Head.
(4) It is said that when the head is broken, the brain plasma overflows. The extension refers to the blow.
(5) The top, center or edge part of the object.
(6) Refers to white things like brains or brains.
匘
